title: Polymer Coating Assisted Shaping of Metal-Organic Framework Particles into Pellets with Enhanced Methane Uptake
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00178H, Paper
Chunhui Wu, Xinxin Chu, Dejun Dai, Xiaolin Wu, Dongxu Wang, Yu Tao, Yue-Biao Zhang, Tao Li
Shaping metal-organic framework (MOF) particles into high packing density pellets through compaction is often accompanied with loss of porosity due to mechanical damage. Instead of shaping neat MOF particles, this...
